review: It works well and is already replacing my roku but there are a few areas where the interface is awkward.  For example, I can see TV shows and movies that I own as two separate lists on Roku and even on the amazon site but I can't figure out how to do the same thing on the Fire stick.  There are a few other touchy areas as well but over all I can't complain!  It is definitely worth the money and my complaints fall into the nit-picky category...
